name: Swedish Spritz Cookies
author: Sharen
instructions: In mixing bowl, beat margarine and sugar until fluffy. Add egg yolk and almond extract, beat well. Beat in flour. Force the unchilled dough through a cookie press onto the ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 375Â° for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are firm but not brown. Cool the baked cookies on wire racks.Variations: Nutty Cookies: Stir 1/2 c. ground nuts with the flour, toast nuts before grinding. Chocolate Cookies: Reduce flour to 2 1/4 cup, add an additional 1/4 cup sugar and 1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder. Add powder before flour.
